text: Hi, I'm Rajeev and my Samsung Galaxy A52 keeps restarting randomly. It started after a software update. Can you help?
My name is Anika Sharma. My MacBook Pro 2020 is overheating frequently. It’s still under warranty.
The printer (HP LaserJet 1020) in our office isn't printing PDFs correctly. My name is Sudhir.
Hey, this is Aarti. I think there's a problem with my Dell Inspiron laptop’s webcam. It doesn’t work on Zoom.
My OnePlus Nord has stopped detecting WiFi networks after I installed a beta OxygenOS update. I’m Alok.
I bought a new Canon EOS 200D and the lens won't auto-focus. Still in warranty. Help please. - Pranav
This is Riya. My Windows 11 desktop froze after the latest update and won’t boot. Is there a fix?
Aman here. My Sony Bravia smart TV is not responding to the remote at all. It’s only 6 months old.
Can someone assist? The fingerprint scanner on my Lenovo ThinkPad X1 has stopped working. I’m Shubham.
My iPhone 14 Pro Max crashes whenever I open Instagram. I’m Nisha. Please help.
Hello, I'm Preeti. My Google Nest device is not responding to voice commands anymore.
Deepak here. I can't update the OS on my iPad Mini 5. It shows a verification error.
This is Vivek. My MSI gaming laptop screen flickers during gameplay on Steam. Still in warranty.
Hi, my daughter’s Amazon Fire Tablet keeps freezing on YouTube Kids. I’m Karan.
My name is Seema. I’m having issues with my HP Envy printer. It won’t connect to Wi-Fi.
Hello support, I’m Pooja. My Dell monitor screen randomly turns black for a second. It’s very annoying.
This is Jayant. I’ve forgotten the password to my ASUS ZenBook and can't get past the login screen.
Hey, this is Aarav. My AirPods Pro disconnect frequently while on calls. They’re still under AppleCare.
Sonia here. My LG refrigerator’s touchscreen is unresponsive and I can't control the settings anymore.
My name is Gaurav, and my Xbox Series X gives an error while launching games from Game Pass.
This is Anu. My Samsung Smartwatch's heart rate sensor isn’t accurate anymore.
I'm Mohit. My Nikon D5600 camera's display isn’t turning on after I changed the battery. It's within warranty.
Namaste, I’m Meenal. The Bluetooth on my Realme phone drops connection every few minutes.
I’m Faisal. The software update on my Mi TV failed and it’s stuck in a boot loop.
Hey, I'm Tanvi. My Epson EcoTank printer is printing faded pages despite new ink.
Ajay here. My JioFiber router randomly drops connection even with full signal. Help needed.
Hi, I’m Shalini. After installing a driver update, my HP Pavilion’s keyboard stopped working.
Hello, I'm Keshav. My PS5 disc drive isn’t reading any games. Bought it last November.
My name is Sweta. I just bought a Lenovo Tab M10 and it won’t download apps from Play Store.
This is Aakash. I think my Google Pixel 7 has a microphone issue. People can't hear me on calls.
Hey, I'm Aryan and my Dell Inspiron laptop just freezes randomly. It's still under warranty. Can I get help?
My name is Tanya. I'm having trouble installing Adobe Illustrator on my MacBook Pro.
Call me Varun. My HP Pavilion screen flickers non-stop. It's quite frustrating. Not sure about the warranty.
This is Neha here. My phone - a Samsung S21 Ultra - won't connect to Wi-Fi since the last update.
I'm using Lenovo ThinkPad and my touchpad is unresponsive. No clue if the warranty is still active. I'm Raj.
Jasmeet here. My Xbox keeps shutting down mid-game. Is it a hardware issue?
Name’s Priya. My Canon printer is jamming papers and I need it for urgent printouts.
I'm trying to run Photoshop on my Surface Pro but it crashes every time. I'm Sidharth, by the way.
My name is Aanya. The volume button on my iPad Air is stuck. I bought it last year.
This is Krish. I'm facing overheating problems with my MSI gaming laptop. Is that common?
Reena here. My Asus monitor won't turn on even after replacing the cable.
Hey, I'm Dev. My Windows 11 PC keeps restarting after the latest update. Help needed.
Hi, I'm facing syncing issues between my Apple Watch and iPhone. My name is Tushar.
I’m Meera. My new Mac Studio doesn't recognize external displays. Bought last month.
Name's Arjun. The fingerprint scanner on my Lenovo Yoga is malfunctioning. Still under warranty.
Nikhil here. My PS5 disc drive is making weird noises and rejecting discs.
This is Minal. My Kindle Paperwhite screen froze completely. No physical damage. Bought last year.
Ravi speaking. My Dell desktop is showing a blue screen error since I installed the latest Windows update.
I'm Seema. My wireless earbuds aren't pairing with any device. They're only two weeks old.
Arpita here. My MacBook Air battery drains rapidly even on sleep mode. Bought it in Jan.
Hi, this is Imran. My Smart TV (Samsung) is not connecting to my home Wi-Fi network. Please assist.
I'm Mayank and the fan in my gaming laptop (Asus ROG) is making loud noises. Still under service period.
This is Shruti. My Windows Surface can't detect the webcam anymore. Skype and Zoom both fail.
Hey, I’m Manan. My Samsung tablet is stuck on the startup logo after a factory reset.
Kriti here. The HDMI port on my Acer laptop is broken. Can I get it repaired under warranty?
Name: Abhishek. My OnePlus Nord has ghost touch issues. Started after a minor fall.
Hello, I am Diya. I installed Zoom on my Chromebook but the camera is not working on calls.
This is Akhil. My Realme buds are only playing audio in one ear. I bought them last week.
Namrata here. My Epson scanner isn't saving scanned files to the correct folder. Need help fixing it.
My name is Tanmay. I’m unable to log in to my Windows laptop after the last update. Keyboard input not working.
